Summary: Biochemical reaction from atorvastatin lactone to 2-hydroxyatorvastatin lactone. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP3A4 or CYP3A5.
Biochemical reaction from atorvastatin lactone to 4-hydroxyatorvastatin lactone. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP3A4 or CYP3A5.
Biochemical reaction from atorvastatin to 2-hydroxyatorvastatin. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP3A4 or CYP3A5.
Biochemical reaction from atorvastatin to 4-hydroxyatorvastatin. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP3A4, CYP3A5 or CYP2C8.
Biochemical reaction from atorvastatin lactone to atorvastatin. This interaction can be catalyzed by PON1 or PON3.
Biochemical reaction from atorvastatin acyl glucuronide to atorvastatin lactone.
Biochemical reaction from atorvastatin to atorvastatin acyl glucuronide. This interaction can be catalyzed by UGT1A3, UGT1A1 or UGT2B7.
Transport from atorvastatin to atorvastatin. This interaction is catalyzed by SLCO1B1.
Transport from atorvastatin to atorvastatin. This interaction can be catalyzed by ABCC2, ABCG2 or ABCB1.
